name: Download Arbitrary Files Via PresentationHost.exe
description: Detects usage of "PresentationHost" which is a utility that runs ".xbap" (Browser Applications) files to download arbitrary files
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((process.executable:*\\presentationhost.exe OR process.pe.original_file_name:PresentationHost.exe) AND process.command_line:(*http\:\/\/* OR *https\:\/\/* OR *ftp\:\/\/*))`
